review.title: “Universitity of excelence”
review.pros: Pros – the academic atmosphere is quite good
review.cons: Cons – not so good management at higher level
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend

review.title: “Education is not what it seems.”
review.pros: Pros – Nice professional group, with good professors.
review.cons: Cons – Low work condition, low benefits.
review.advice-to-management: No, I would not recommend this company to a friend

review.title: “I was a PhD student at UAIC, Faculty of Biology, Biochemistry and Molecular Biology Department, Iasi, Romania.”
review.pros: Pros – I have done my thesis on 2 biomarkers (miR-200c and miR-9) with a role in appearence and progression in breast cancer.
review.cons: Cons – small paymentit's hard to work with few reagents
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – To pay attention on buying reagents.

review.title: “A new step in my career.”
review.pros: Pros – I work with nice, friendly and intelligent peoples.
review.cons: Cons – The salary doesn't cover the effort mostly for the employees that work in weekends.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Improuve the HR management. The management should motivate his employees through proper methods such money rewards.

review.title: “Good for starting”
review.pros: Pros – The good thing is that you can work with the best researchers
review.cons: Cons – Learning to settle for less
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company
